content: Do we have any convenient means to find out all implementors for a given autotrait within a set of crates?
rustdoc list is limited to send and sync crates, I would like to find out this information for an arbitrary autotrait.
I guess I could adjust the compiler for the purpose as well, but it if we had another way it would be pretty dope
Seems like rustdoc should be fixed to show all autotraits, no?
is there a way to see all known autotraits?
(keep accidentally doing awkward things on zulip...)
if not, i guess we could load in all auto traits in the current crate as well as Send/Sync
